title: TiVo: Using Haxe to improve user experience for millions of customers
author: Josefiene Pertosa
description: During the last three years, the development team at TiVo have had an impressive journey - from first evaluating Haxe, to having a million lines of Haxe code running on millions of devices. The experience has not only benefited the development team - but the customers - who are thrilled with the performance increases.
